variable.name: sb_autohide
variable.description: This toggles in which cases the server browser should automatically hide itself when connecting to a server.

value.description: This will cause the server browser to always hide after connecting
This will cause the server browser to hide after connecting only, if the connected server is not a qizmo proxy, useful if you often connect to Qizmos only for rerouting features (with "useproxy 1")
